comment: Excellent workflow for novel protein structure prediction, MSA assessment was comprehensive
Perfect explanation of X-ray vs cryo-EM decision tree with cost/timeline breakdown
Good AlphaFold interpretation but could include more on PAE domain orientation errors
Excellent MolProbity validation guide with specific thresholds for clashscore and Ramachandran
Helpful membrane protein workflow but would benefit from more detergent screening details
Perfect explanation of iptm and chain-chain PAE for complex validation
Comprehensive IDP characterization workflow covering NMR, SAXS, and MD ensemble methods
Good tool selection but could include more on GPU requirements for AlphaFold3
Excellent MSA generation guide with HHblits, JackHMMER, and Neff assessment
Helpful coevolution analysis but would like more on EVcouplings DCA thresholds
Perfect cryo-EM validation workflow with FSC, Q-score, and local resolution guidance
Excellent interface analysis with buried surface area and shape complementarity metrics
Good Rosetta ab initio explanation but could include more on sampling parameters
Perfect homology modeling decision tree with sequence identity thresholds
Helpful MD workflow but would benefit from more on force field selection (CHARMM vs AMBER)
Excellent conservation analysis workflow with ConSurf and functional residue identification
Good docking workflow but could include more on HADDOCK restraint types
Perfect template availability decision tree with clear thresholds
Excellent NMR workflow for small proteins with isotope labeling details
Helpful but would like more on LCP crystallography for membrane proteins
Perfect pLDDT interpretation guide with confidence ranges and implications
Good enhanced sampling explanation but could include more on metadynamics CV selection
Excellent size-based method selection with specific tools for each range
Helpful but would benefit from including RFdiffusion for protein design scenarios
Perfect oligomeric state guidance with AlphaFold-Multimer vs experimental comparison
Excellent comprehensive validation hierarchy covering all tool categories
Good resource estimates but could include cloud computing cost specifics
Perfect AlphaFold3 vs Rosetta vs Boltz comparison with use case clarity
Helpful CHARMM-GUI workflow but would like more on bilayer composition options
Excellent PDB deposition checklist with validation requirements
Good but would benefit from including ESM language model applications
Perfect experimental vs computational decision matrix with clear criteria
Excellent disorder prediction workflow with IUPred2 and AlphaFold pLDDT correlation
Helpful but would like more on RoseTTAFold three-track architecture
Perfect complex modeling workflow with paired MSA and coevolution integration
